Preventive Care and Screening Measure Pair: a. Tobacco Use Assessment (NQF 0028a)

eMeasure Name Preventive Care and Screening Measure Pair: a. Tobacco Use Assessment eMeasure Id 0c73160f-435c-4c10-8310-4fe1871d97d1
Version number 1 eMeasure Set Id 8063bd27-8a5f-405a-bb1a-194ece746b51
Available Date No information Measurement Period January 1, 20xx through December 31, 20xx
Measure Steward American Medical Association - Physician Consortium for Performance Improvement
Endorsed by National Quality Forum
Description Percentage of patients aged 18 years or older who have been seen for at least 2 office visits, who were queried about tobacco use one or more times within 24 months.
Copyright 
© 2010 American Medical Association. All Rights Reserved
Measure scoring Proportion
Measure type Process
Stratification 
None
Risk Adjustment 
None
Data Aggregation 

            

            

               Rationale
               
Tobacco use is one of the leading causes of many preventable diseases, however, not all individuals are screened for tobacco use.

            

            

               Clinical Recommendation Statement
               
The USPSTF strongly recommends that clinicians screen all adults for tobacco use and provide tobacco cessation interventions for those who use tobacco products. (A Recommendation) (USPSTF, 2003).

            

            

               Improvement notation
               
Higher score indicates better quality

            

            

               Measurement duration
               
12 month(s)

            

            

               Reference
               
U. S. Preventive Services Task Force. Counseling to prevent tobacco use and tobacco-related diseases: Recommendation statement. November 2003. Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality. Rockville, MD. Available at: http://www.ahrq.gov/clinic/3rduspstf/tobaccounrs/htm. Accessed November 2007.

            

            

               Definition
               
Initial Patient Population(s): Patient Age:  Patients aged 18 years and older at the beginning of the measurement period Diagnosis Active:  There is no diagnosis associated with this measure. Encounter:  At least 2 visits (or at least 1 preventive medicine visit) with the physician, physician's assistant, or nurse practitioner during the measurement period.

            

            

               Definition
               
Denominator(s): All patients aged 18 years and older

            

            

               Definition
               
Denominator Exclusions: N/A

            

            

               Definition
               
Numerator(s): Patients who were queried about tobacco use one or more times within 24 months

            

            

               Definition
               
Denominator Exceptions: N/A

            

            

               Guidance
               

            

            

               Supplemental Data Elements
               
Report "Patient Characteristic: Gender" using "Gender HL7 Value Set (2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.1)"; Report "Patient Characteristic: Race" using "Race CDC Value Set (2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.836)"; Report "Patient Characteristic: Ethnicity" using "Ethnicity CDC Value Set (2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.837)"; Report "Patient Characteristic: Payer" using "Payer Source of Payment Typology Value Set (2.16.840.1.113883.3.221.5)".

Population criteria

      

         
         
    
            
  • 
               Initial Patient Population =
               
               
      
                  
    • AND: "Patient Characteristic: birth date"  >= 18 year(s) starts before start of "Measurement period"
      • 
                  
    • AND: 
                     
        
                        
      • OR: Count >= 2  of:
                           
          
                              
        • OR: "Encounter: Encounter Health and Behavior Assessment"
          • 
                              
        • OR: "Encounter: Encounter Occupational Therapy"
          • 
                              
        • OR: "Encounter: Encounter Office Visit"
          • 
                              
        • OR: "Encounter: Encounter Psychiatric & Psychologic"
          • 
                              
        •  during "Measurement period"
          • 
                           
        
                           
                        
        • 
                        
      • OR: Count >= 1  of:
                           
          
                              
        • OR: "Encounter: Encounter Prev Med Group Counseling"
          • 
                              
        • OR: "Encounter: Encounter Prev Med Other Services"
          • 
                              
        • OR: "Encounter: Encounter Prev Med Services 18 and Older"
          • 
                              
        • OR: "Encounter: Encounter Prev Med-Individual counseling"
          • 
                              
        •  during "Measurement period"
          • 
                           
        
                           
                        
        • 
                     
      
                     
                  
      • 
               
    
               
            
    • 
            
  • 
               Denominator =
               
               
      
                  
    • AND: "Initial Patient Population"
      • 
               
    
               
            
    • 
            
  • 
               Denominator Exclusions =
               
               
      
                  
    • None
      • 
               
    
               
            
    • 
            
  • 
               Numerator =
               
               
      
                  
    • AND: 
                     
        
                        
      • OR: "Patient Characteristic: Tobacco Non-User"
        • 
                        
      • OR: "Patient Characteristic: Tobacco User"
        • 
                        
      •  starts before or during 
                           
          
                              
        • OR: "Encounter: Encounter Health and Behavior Assessment"
          • 
                              
        • OR: "Encounter: Encounter Occupational Therapy"
          • 
                              
        • OR: "Encounter: Encounter Office Visit"
          • 
                              
        • OR: "Encounter: Encounter Psychiatric & Psychologic"
          • 
                              
        • OR: "Encounter: Encounter Prev Med Group Counseling"
          • 
                              
        • OR: "Encounter: Encounter Prev Med Other Services"
          • 
                              
        • OR: "Encounter: Encounter Prev Med Services 18 and Older"
          • 
                              
        • OR: "Encounter: Encounter Prev Med-Individual counseling"
          •

Data criteria (QDM Data Elements)

      

         
         
    
            
  • 
               "Encounter: Encounter Health and Behavior Assessment" using "Encounter Health and Behavior Assessment CPT Value Set (2.16.840.1.113883.3.526.02.105)"
            
    • 
            
  • 
               "Encounter: Encounter Occupational Therapy" using "Encounter Occupational Therapy CPT Value Set (2.16.840.1.113883.3.526.02.102)"
            
    • 
            
  • 
               "Encounter: Encounter Office Visit" using "Encounter Office Visit CPT Value Set (2.16.840.1.113883.3.526.02.114)"
            
    • 
            
  • 
               "Encounter: Encounter Prev Med Group Counseling" using "Encounter Prev Med Group Counseling CPT Value Set (2.16.840.1.113883.3.526.02.107)"
            
    • 
            
  • 
               "Encounter: Encounter Prev Med-Individual counseling" using "Encounter Prev Med-Individual counseling CPT Value Set (2.16.840.1.113883.3.526.02.106)"
            
    • 
            
  • 
               "Encounter: Encounter Prev Med Other Services" using "Encounter Prev Med Other Services CPT Value Set (2.16.840.1.113883.3.526.02.108)"
            
    •

  • 
               "Encounter: Encounter Psychiatric & Psychologic" using "Encounter Psychiatric & Psychologic CPT Value Set (2.16.840.1.113883.3.526.02.103)"
            
    • 
            
  • 
               "Patient Characteristic: birth date" using "birth date LOINC Value Set (2.16.840.1.113883.3.560.100.4)"
            
    • 
            
  • 
               "Patient Characteristic: Tobacco Non-User" using "Tobacco Non-User SNOMED-CT Value Set (2.16.840.1.113883.3.526.02.511)"
            
    • 
            
  • 
               "Patient Characteristic: Tobacco User" using "Tobacco User SNOMED-CT Value Set (2.16.840.1.113883.3.526.02.422)"
